```{r}
#| echo: false

options(warn = -1)

library(ggplot2)

insurance_data <- read.csv("insurance_data_S26.csv", header = TRUE)

xcont <- colnames(insurance_data)

xcat

for (col_name in colnames(insurance_data)) {
  plot <- ggplot(insurance_data, aes(insurance_data[[col_name]], charges)) + 
  geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(data = insurance_data, method = "lm", color = "red") +
    labs(
    title = paste(col_name, " vs Charges"),
    x = paste(col_name),
    y = "Charges"
  )
  print(plot)
}

```
